bridgeFrom(address,address[],uint256[]).details: Wrapper around userPositions func to decrease user's token balance

bridgeTo(address,address[],uint256[]).details: Wrapper around userPositions func, updateTokenPoolLpBalances, and feeHandler

returns._0: The address of the gas account

params.asset: Address of the ERC20 token contract

getTokenPoolLpActivePositions(address).details: this returns the sum of all active LP positions for a given token. This is different than the LP balance, as the LP balance is the available amount of this sum. This number is gte the LP balance, usually greater than.

params.asset: Address of the ERC20 token contract

Address of the ERC20 token contract

params.controllers_: The addresses of the controlling contracts
params.relayAccount_: The address of the relay account that will control this account

undoBridgeFrom(address,address[],uint256.details: Wrapper around userPositions func to increase user's token balance

params.relayAccount_: The address of the relay account

claimLpFeeRewards(address,address[]).notice: User is allowed to claim fees

provideLiquidity(address,address[],uint2.notice: User is allowed to LP whitelisted tokens
